Package io.crums.sldg.entry

Class TextEntry

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.entry.Entry
io.crums.sldg.entry.TextEntry
Direct Known Subclasses:
TokenizedEntry
public class TextEntry
extends Entry
UTF-8 encoded text entry. The hashing operation remains the default.

  • Method Details

    • toBuffer

      public static java.nio.ByteBuffer toBuffer​(java.lang.String text)
      Returns the given text a UTF-8 encoded byte sequence. The returned buffer is not read-only.

    • toBytes

      public static byte[] toBytes​(java.lang.String text)
      Returns text as a byte array in UTF-8 encoding.

    • toString

      public static java.lang.String toString​(byte[] bytes)
      Returns bytes a UTF-8 encoded string.

    • toString

      public static java.lang.String toString​(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Returns the given buffer as a UTF-8 encoded string. On return, the buffer argument has no remaining bytes.

    • reNumber

      public TextEntry reNumber​(long rowNumber)
      Description copied from class: Entry
      Returns this entry, but with a new row number.
      Overrides:
      reNumber in class Entry
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - ≥ 1
      Returns:
      a new instance of this class if rowNumber is not the same as this instance; this instance, otherwise.
